statements: SELECT * FROM property_management_staff_permissions;
SELECT staff_id, staff_name FROM property_management_staff_permissions;
SELECT property_id, access_level FROM property_management_staff_permissions ORDER BY staff_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_management_staff_permissions WHERE access_level='admin';
SELECT staff_name, property_id FROM property_management_staff_permissions WHERE staff_id=100;
SELECT staff_id, staff_name, property_id, access_level FROM property_management_staff_permissions WHERE staff_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM property_management_staff_permissions WHERE property_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT staff_id, staff_name FROM property_management_staff_permissions WHERE property_id = 2 AND access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT DISTINCT access_level FROM property_management_staff_permissions ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT property_id, COUNT(*) AS num_staff FROM property_management_staff_permissions GROUP BY property_id HAVING num_staff > 1;
SELECT * FROM property_managers
SELECT name, role FROM property_managers WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, property_id FROM property_managers ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM property_access WHERE access_level = 'admin'
SELECT user_id, property_id FROM property_access ORDER BY user_id DESC, property_id ASC
SELECT * FROM property_managers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, role FROM property_managers WHERE property_id = 5;
SELECT id, name, property_id FROM property_managers WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT name, role FROM property_managers WHERE id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT * FROM property_access WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM property_managers;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM property_managers WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT property_name, address, city, state, postal_code FROM properties WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT property_name, address, city, state, postal_code FROM properties ORDER BY state DESC, city ASC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE can_view = TRUE AND can_edit = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM property_managers WHERE role = 'Manager' AND name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM property_managers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT property_name, address, city, state, postal_code FROM properties WHERE state = 'CA' ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE can_view = TRUE AND can_edit = TRUE AND can_delete = FALSE ORDER BY permission_id;
SELECT property_name, city, state, postal_code FROM properties WHERE city = 'New York' OR city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM property_managers;
SELECT manager_name, manager_email FROM property_managers;
SELECT property_name, property_address FROM properties ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT permission_name, permission_description FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_name ASC;
SELECT manager_name, manager_phone FROM property_managers WHERE manager_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT property_name FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment' ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_roles WHERE role_description LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT manager_name, property_name FROM property_managers JOIN properties ON property_managers.manager_id = properties.property_id WHERE property_type = 'House';
SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM access_roles JOIN permissions ON access_roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE role_name = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM property_management_staff;
SELECT staff_name, staff_role FROM property_management_staff;
SELECT staff_id, staff_name, staff_role FROM property_management_staff WHERE staff_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM property_permissions WHERE permission_id = 2;

SELECT staff_name, permission_name FROM property_management_staff JOIN staff_permissions ON property_management_staff.staff_id = staff_permissions.staff_id JOIN property_permissions ON staff_permissions.permission_id = property_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM property_management_staff;
SELECT staff_name, staff_role FROM property_management_staff ORDER BY staff_name ASC;
SELECT staff_name, staff_role FROM property_management_staff WHERE staff_role = 'Manager';
SELECT DISTINCT staff_role FROM property_management_staff;

SELECT staff_name, p.permission_name FROM property_management_staff s JOIN user_roles u ON s.staff_id = u.staff_id JOIN staff_permissions sp ON s.staff_id = sp.staff_id JOIN property_permissions p ON sp.permission_id = p.permission_id;
